column7: 有志者事竟成，多么美好的世界
column8: And every night has its day
column10: 黑夜过去的黎明，这里充满神奇
column11: And if there's love in this life
column13: 如果生活充满爱，世界将不再阻碍
column17: 星期一我被无情地击败
column18: Tuesday I was through with hoping
column19: 星期二我就在希望中复活
column20: Wednesday my empty arms were open
column24: 星期四等待爱，等待爱的到来
column27: I'm burning like a fire gone wild on Saturday
column28: 星期六我像疯狂燃烧的野火
column29: Guess I won't be coming to church on Sunday
column30: 星期日我将不会去教堂
column33: 我会等待爱，等待爱的到来
column36: We are one of a kind irreplaceable
column38: How did I get so blind and so cynical
column39: 我是如何变得如此盲目和愤世嫉俗的
column40: If there's love in this life we're unstoppable
column41: 如果爱进入生活我们无法阻挡
